attributes.action: Fine people who steal others pushbikes and make them pay for damage!
attributes.background: Ok so i had my road bike stolen and managed to get it back tha ks to pcso's in burton justive was not served regardless of fingerprints ive had to repair my road bike due to the theves damaging it it aint far why should we have to oay for there damage make justice make then fix or replace!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
